name: Easy.vet
shortDescription: Easy.vet wanted to create a pet shop management system
description: Easy.vet wanted to create a pet shop management system that stood out where most other systems fail, in the visual and usability aspect. After extensive research of the market, I tried to identify the main functions that the system could offer to the clients.

sections.title: My role
sections.description: My role was to create all the information architecture, visual and usability part of the application. Easy.vet wanted to keep everything simple and with easy-to-use menus, unlike other applications on the market. Using surveys and usability tests, the application was developed based on feedback from these surveys and tests.

sections.title: My challenge
sections.description: The application has many tools, so the challenge was to keep everything simple with a navigation that would still help the user find what he wanted. Adapting the screens to mobile phones while maintaining ease of navigation was also a challenge.

sections.title: The result
sections.description: The end result was a system that maintains all the functionality of a complex system, but with a simpler and more intuitive navigation, which helps the user to find what they need in a quick and simple way. The system continues to collect user navigation information to provide Feedback and make changes if needed.
